Title: Afro Samurai: Resurrection
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Eric S. Calderon, Leo Chu, Joshua Hale Fialkov (Writer), Eric Garcia, Yasuyuki Muto, Takashi Okazaki
Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Lucy Liu, Mark Hamill, Grey Griffin
Plot: When his father's body is stolen from its grave, Afro takes up his sword again to tear through an army of deadly foes led by a sadistic leader.
